entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
